item.description:
~Secrets of Aboriginal Healing~

Robbie Holz is an international speaker, holistic wellness consultant, and co-author of the multiple award-winning Journey to the Heart: Secrets of Aboriginal Healing. Her life was drastically altered in 1985 after she contracted Hepatitis C from a blood transfusion. Due to her reaction to the Hepatitis treatment, she developed fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue syndrome and became bedridden for over 6 months.

Going on a quest for wellness, Robbie met Dr. Gary Holz, a physicist, Psycho-Neuro-Immunologist and alternative healer. Gary taught her the aboriginal healing techniques he learned from his encounter with remote Outback Aborigines, chronicled in Journey to the Heart: Secrets of Aboriginal Healing. Using the aboriginal methods, Robbie healed herself of Hepatitis C.

Robbie will be sharing her experiences and learning with us. Cost: $25

Sunday, May 5, 1:00PM

group.name: The First Spiritualist Church of Quincy

item.name: Secrets of Aboriginal Healing
